bill.title: Homestead exemption; increase and prorate for homeowner reaching age 65 after January 1 of year for which exemption is claimed.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Sections 27-33-67 And 27-33-75, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That Qualified Homeowners Who Reach Age Sixty-five After January 1 Of The Year For Which The Homestead Exemption Is Claimed Shall Be Exempt, On A Prorated Basis For That Year, From All Ad Valorem Taxes Not In Excess Of $7,500.00 Of The Assessed Value Of The Homestead Property Based On The Ratio That The Number Of Full Months Remaining In The Year After The Month In Which The Homeowner Reaches Age Sixty-five Bears To The Total Number Of Months In The Year; To Amend Section 27-33-31, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Conform To The Provisions Of This Act; And For Related Purposes.
